fullText:
Dreadful Doom

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Revenant, invoker, Covenant of Malediction class feature
Benefit: You can push a target under the effect of maledictor’s doom power 1 square whenever it is hit by a fear, cold, or necrotic attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 64.
name: Dreadful Doom
